column2: This Casus Belli can be used for an unsanctioned seizure of §Y$TITLE$§! by §Y$CLAIMANT$§!. Doing so may earn the ire of the empire.
This Casus Belli can be used to seize §Y$TITLE$§! by force. This action is a grand endeavor and can only be taken once in a long while.
The lost territory of the Empire must be reclaimed! §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can use this Casus Belli to seize all titles held by §Y$TARGET$§! within the de jure §Y$TITLE$§!.
This Casus Belli is only used against dangerous tyrants and villains.
This Casus Belli can be used to restore §Y$CLAIMANT$§! to the head of the §Y$TITLE$§!.
A group of peasants have banded together under the Yellow Turban name and rebelled against the empire.
The Qiang and Di tribes have joined together with several treacherous Liang officials to rebel against the empire.
Barbarians along the frontier are constantly raiding and threatening the borders of the empire.
Yellow Turbans can conquer single border counties without specific reasons at the cost of §Y50§! Piety.
